ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
This place feels more peaceful when you’re
around, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
I’ve got some valuable information that could be
to your advantage! Would you like to hear it?
I’ll tell you and no one else!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
I stocked up on some quality wares. Please, take
this!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
This is a product sample, so I hope you’ll tell me
what you think of it!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
I’ve procured something I thought might be useful
for you!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
Spreading the word about my wares is great for
business, you know. Why, supporting you now is
actually an investment in my own fortunes!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
I’ve got a great deal just for you! Today, you can
have this...free of charge!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
You always give me valuable information, so I’m
happy to sponsor your activities,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
Considering the value of that information, I could
give you goods for free and still come out ahead!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I’ve heard some news you may be interested in,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I always find our talks engrossing,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]—not only as a
merchant but on a personal level, too!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2302_01_10:
Oh, thank you! I didn’t expect to receive something
from a customer!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
What an excellent item! How much do I owe you
for it?
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
...Nothing?! I’m usually wary of anything given
away for free—there’s often a hidden price! But
since it’s coming from you, I’ll gladly accept it!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Thank you—that information will be very useful.
Please do come share again!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2401_01_10: Oh my, look how long we’ve been talking!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Next time you have a chance, please do come and
talk with me for as long as time allows!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
A good merchant understands the value of
information.
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
The world is a rough place. If you don’t know
what’s going on, you won’t last long out there.
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8001_0701_03_10: So I have to collect fresh information here.
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
What I find most useful about photographs is that
they allow you to share visual information!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I myself sometimes struggle to explain things with
words alone...
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
But if you have a photograph on hand, you can
use it to convey much clearer information with
greater accuracy!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Studying history is not just my hobby. You could
say it’s my reason for living!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
So much history has built up in the world through
the lives of people and Pokémon, ever since the
time of legends...
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
The more history I learn, the more my curiosity
pushes me to unravel more of its mysteries!
ch0297_00_volo_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Learning about history changes the way we view
the world—even the way we live and think!
